controllers.editor

Class PlatformSpecificGameFieldsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.editor.PlatformSpecificGameFieldsHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MameGameFieldsHandler, SingleRomFileGameFieldsHandler, SteamGameFieldsHandler

    abstract class PlatformSpecificGameFieldsHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Has the responsability to modifiy the GamesViewController interface to fit the selected game platform.
    Author:
    Thomas Debouverie
